properties.name: tomcat.cert
properties.description: TLS cert file used by tomcat, if null, the tls will be disabled.

properties.name: tomcat.pvk
properties.description: TLS private key file used by tomcat.

properties.name: tomcat.chain
properties.description: TLS cert chain file used by tomcat.

properties.name: data-directory
properties.description: Directory to save application data files.

properties.name: temporary-data
properties.description: If true,use system temp directory as data-directory.

properties.name: defense.frequency.enable
properties.description: enable frequency limiter to limit request frequency.

properties.name: defense.frequency.threshold
properties.description: how many request at time should be sleeped.
